name: ArenaShooter Prototype
description:
Just a simple arena shooter.

Keyboard controls:
WASD to move
Mouse to shoot
Space to pause

Controller controls:
Left Joystick to move
Right Joystick to aim
R2 to shoot
Start to pause

Upgrade system coming soon :tm:

Changelog:
V0.1.0
Release

V0.1.1
Fixed UI Scaling
Added Pickups
Randomized orange spawns
